ygData.subject: Re: Reminder - eqbards chat on irc
ygData.msgSnippet: I sent an email privately - but I m worried the Owner doesn t check that address regularly.. Anyone know which IRC Server he means - there are MANY.... Slyde
ygData.messageBody:
I sent an email privately - but I'm worried the Owner doesn't check that
address regularly..

Anyone know which IRC Server he means - there are MANY....

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: <eqbards-owner@onelist.com>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 6:02 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Reminder - eqbards chat on irc


> From: eqbards-owner@onelist.com
>
> We would like to remind you of this upcoming event.
>
> eqbards chat on irc
>
> Date: Wednesday, October 20, 1999
> Time: 08:00PM - 11:00PM EDT (GMT-04:00)
>
> a moderated chat for all to join if things go well we may make
> it an open chat. a good way to share opinions and meet your
> fellow bards.
>
